item.title: Short notes on plantuml
item.description: plantuml installing and running sudo pacman -S graphviz plantuml plantuml (produces png) state machine syntax [] = start node -> = coming from start node Pending = state name Pending : project = state transition name Lapsed -> [] = going to end node @startuml [*] -> Pending : Project Pending --> Active : [projectstartdate = currentdate] Active --> Lapsed : [projectfinishdate = currentdate] Lapsed --> [*] : after [6 months] @enduml Class diagram @startuml skinparam roundcorner 20 skinparam class { BackgroundColor #FFFFFF ArrowColor DarkGreen BorderColor DarkGreen } abstract class Person { #Id: string #name: string #age: int } class Employee { +Department: Department +Salary: Decimal } class Professor { +Expertise: String } class Student { +Grade: int +GradeLetter: Char +GraduationYear: Year +void UpdateGrade() } Person <|-- Employee Employee <|-- Professor Person <|-- Student @enduml Use case diagram @startuml left to right direction skinparam packageStyle rectangle actor Lecturer actor Student actor Admin rectangle University-System { Lecturer --> (Grade Exam) Lecturer --> (Manage Course) Lecturer ---> (Access Course Information) Student ---> (Access Course Information) Student ---> (Enroll in Course) Admin ---> (Access Course Information) Admin ---> (Manage Course) } @enduml @startuml left to right direction skinparam packageStyle rectangle skinparam roundcorner 20 skinparam usecase { BackgroundColor #FFFFFF ArrowColor DarkGreen BorderColor #5E00FF } actor Customer #white;line:5E00FF;line.
